{{- /* Work around wrong escapes in integrity attributes. */ -}} {{- $name := .Get 0 -}} {{- with $name -}} {{- $value := $.Page.Param . -}} {{- if in $name "_hash" -}} {{- $value = $value | safeHTML -}} {{- end -}} {{- with $value }}{{ . }}{{ else }}{{ errorf "Param %q not found: %s" $name $.Position }}{{ end -}} {{- else }}{{ errorf "Missing param key: %s" $.Position }}{{ end -}}
